title: Fracking Firm to Sell Pink Drill Bits for Susan G. Komen Partnership
subtitle: Oil giant Baker Hughes donated $100,000 to the Susan G. Komen Foundation and now plans to distribute 1000 pink drill bits.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Oil giant Baker Hughes donated $100,000 to the Susan G. Komen Foundation and now plans to distribute 1000 pink drill bits.
